name: Game Freak Resource Package
summary: Learn about .GFPAK files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Most Pokémon players will never encounter GFPAK files. However, Pokémon modders frequently extract GFPAK files from games and alter the resources they contain. For example, a modder might retrieve a GFPAK file from a game, extract the assets the GFPAK file contains, and alter those assets to make a Pokémon appear differently in-game.

After modifying the resources a GFPAK file contains, modders repackage the resources into a new GFPAK file. They can then install the file in the game from which it came, using custom Nintendo Switch firmware, and/or distribute the file for other players to install.

instructions: You can use Switch-Toolbox (Windows) to extract the resources a GFPAK file contains. You can also use Switch-Toolbox to package resources into a GFPAK file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
